list.text: I possess skills in frontend development to create web pages, functionalities, and integrate APIs. In my current work, I mainly focus on client-side rendering (CSR), but I have recently been exploring server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) using Next.js. I also utilize Vercel to seamlessly deploy my projects by connecting with GitHub.

I have also utilized Laravel for API development.I have utilized MySQL's EXPLAIN feature to understand the execution plan of SQL queries and have made use of appropriate indexes to enhance search performance. Additionally, I have employed partitioning and sharding techniques to optimize databases.
